name: LANGUAGE
description: This contains a list of languages and their properties, both spoken and written.

columns.name: LANGUAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the language record.

columns.name: LANGUAGE_ID_LANGUAGE_NAME
columns.description: The language name. If the language is written and uses more than one script to represent it, the name will contain the script in parentheses after the language name.

columns.name: LANGUAGE_NAME
columns.description: The language name. If the language is written and uses more than one script to represent it, the name will contain the script in parentheses after the language name.
